title: SC to announce verdict regarding reserved seats on Friday
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 11 (APP): The Supreme Court of Pakistan would announce its verdict on Friday in appeal of Sunni Ittehad Council (SIC) regarding the reserved seats.
The Registrar Office of the top court has issued the cause the list, according to which the decision would be pronounced Friday morning 9:00am.
It may be mentioned here that a full court bench, presided by Chief Justice of Pakistan Qazi Faez Isa, reserved the verdict into the case on Tuesday after the respondentsâ€™ lawyers concluded their arguments.
The Peshawar High Court (PHC) had upheld the verdict of Election Commission of Pakistan (ECP) for not awarding reserved seats to SIC. The decision was challenged before the apex court.
